text: 4.25: 1 Kin 17.1; 17.7; 18.1Gu guigira khar nde nzuai, fhum Iraiza Isreran ki tugen mani rimgi mbigi vhɨrve, mbe Isreran ki. Mba tugen Fhe Bakɨme mbok thɨvigim, mpari mpuveni khegntɨrive, mpora thɨgi kɨnin mbok nzigi fhu. Mba tugen mba Isrer fhain, mbe guigira mba tɨvgiap, gumgi gu mbigi vhɨrve, mbe thir vhɨzi.
